Hastarglyrr was copper dragon that lived on the Western Heartlands region of FaerÃ»n circa the .
Hastarglyrr was an ally of the Rillyn noble family of Baldurs Gate, and would seek out any enemies that dared attack the familys estate in the city.
Hastarglyrr was born sometime between the late 7 and late 14 centuries DR.While Hastarglyrrs birth year or century is not stated, it is listed as an adult dragon as of 1492 DR. This would make Hastarglyrr between 101 to 800 years old, with a birth year between 692 and 1391 DR.
